column1: Smoque BBQ////with all this corn going to subsidized ethanol initiatives
column2: it's getting harder to get good beef at a reasonable price.  nevertheless
column3: and despite a few recent forgivable inconsistencies*
column4: smoque has managed to deliver a quality product while still maintaining value to the customer.  the store keeps no inventory
column6: their capacity for the day is their smokers' capacity.  fresh food at a reasonable price means long lines and when the food's out
column7: it's out--this used to be a major issue
column8: but has become more reasonable in recent months.
